title: How to monitor APK files in Android System
content:
Is there a monitoring tool for Android except 
logcat
which works like Process Monitor in Windows ? Thanks

answers_data.content: If you have root access in device you can use ps, also you can use /proc file system.
I have used "File Monitor" from SteelWorks (I am not associated with this company in any way) on a non-routed Android device and it works fine.

comments.text: Unfortunately this app doesn't show operations (read/write etc.) completed on assets files in Android apps, so it's useless for reverse engineering such apps.
